effect.shortEffect: Enables Normal & Fighting type moves to hit Ghost types. Accuracy cannot be lowered, ignores evasion.
effect.full: Upon Terastallizing, Ogerpon's Ability will change to Embody Aspect, and one of its stats is raised, depending on the mask: Teal Mask - Speed, Wellspring Mask - Sp Def., Hearthflame Mask - Attack, Cornerstone Mask - Defense.
